item.description: 移除文件列表中的选项 self.btnRemove.clicked.connect(self.remove_item_callback) def remove_item_callback(self): for item in self.listWidget.selectedItems(): self.listWidget.takeItem(self.listWidget.row(item)) 在列表上双击 self.fileListWidget = QListWidget() self.fileListWidget.itemDoubleClicked.connect(self.fileitemDoubleClicked) def fileitemDoubleClicked(self, item=None): currIndex = self.mImgList.index(ustr(item.text().split()[1])) if currIndex < len(self.mImgList): filename = self.mImgList[currIndex] if filename: self.loadFile(filename) self.listWidget.pressed.connect(self.saveClickState) # Get when the mouse goes down self.listWidget.itemEntered.connect(self.setClickState) # when the mouse is dragged from PyQt5.QtGui import * from PyQt5.QtCore import * from PyQt5.QtWidgets import

item.title: pyqt toolbar
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: super(QToolBar, self).setFixedHeight(value) https://github.com/tpoveda/tpQtLib/blob/da4baa56b457061bcd17fd52a4a66b64d672c035/source/tpQtLib/widgets/toolbar.py 修改toolbar的显示区域 self.addToolBar(Qt.TopToolBarArea, toolbar) 修改toolbar的大小 toolBar.setFixedHeight(36); - works well. But if I set icon size after this: toolBar->setFixedHeight(36); toolBar->setIconSize(QSize(10, 10)); height breaks down. Also it happens if I set icon size via stylesheet. Changing of calls order helps: toolBar->setIconSize(QSize(10, 10)); toolBar->setFixedHeight(36); super(QToolBar, self).setFixedHeight(value) def

item.title: Python时间格式化
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: content {:toc} time.strftime 可以实现时间格式化 time.strptime 可以实现字符串转时间 >>> import time >>> time.localtime() time.struct_time(tm_year=2017, tm_mon=4, tm_mday=12, tm_hour=13, tm_min=44, tm_sec=57, tm_wday=2, tm_yday=102, tm_isdst=0) >>> print time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d',time.localtime()) 2017-04-12 >>> time.strptime('2017-04-12','%Y-%m-%d') time.struct_time(tm_year=2017, tm_mon=4, tm_mday=12, tm_hour=0, tm_min=0, tm_sec=0, tm_wday=2, tm_yday=102, tm_isdst=-1) >>> 格式化符号 %a 英文星期简写 %A 英文星期

item.title: Python 压缩及解压缩文件
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: content {:toc} import os import zipfile def zip_dir(dirname,zipfilename): filelist = [] if os.path.isfile(dirname): filelist.append(dirname) else : for root, dirs, files in os.walk(dirname): for name in files: filelist.append(os.path.join(root, name)) zf = zipfile.ZipFile(zipfilename, "w", zipfile.zlib.DEFLATED) for tar in filelist: arcname = tar[len(dirname):] zf.write(tar,arcname) zf.close() def unzip_file(zipfilename, unziptodir): if not os.path.exists(unziptodir): os.mkdir(unziptodir, 0777) zfobj = zipfile.ZipFile(zipfilename) for name in zfobj.namelist(): name = name.replace('\\','/') if name.endswith('/'): os.mkdir(os.path.join(unziptodir, name)) else: ext_filename = os.path.join(unziptodir, name) ext_dir=

item.title: Python 对文件和文件夹的相关操作
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: content {:toc} Python 对文件、文件夹的操作通常涉及到 os 模块和 shutil 模块。 创建文件 1. os.system('touch A') # 创建空文件 A 2. open('A','w') # 打开 A 文件，如果不存在则创建 创建目录 os.mkdir('A/B') # 创建目录 B，A

item.title: Python 去除字符串空格
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: a = " x y z " print a.strip() #return "x y z" print a.lstrip() #return "x y z " print a.rstrip() #return " x y z" print a.replace(' ','') #return "xyz"

item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: https://github.com/mprat/pascal-voc-python #!/usr/bin/env python # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- import os import codecs sys.stdout=io.TextIOWrapper(sys.stdout.buffer,encoding='utf8') path = "." #文件夹目录 files= os.listdir(path) #得到文件夹下的所有文件名称 s = [] for file in files: #遍历文件夹 if not os.path.isdir(file): #判断是否是文件夹，不是文件夹才打开 f = codecs.open(file,'r+',encoding='utf-8')#必须事先知道文件的编码格式，这里文件编码是使用的utf-8 for line in f: line=line.strip('\n') readline = line.split(': ') # print(readline) # instance = [] # if not(any("?" in s for s in readline)): # print(s) if readline[0] == 'title' : try: os.rename(file, readline[1]+".md") print(readline[1]+".
